/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a stark contrast between the natural and man-made elements. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue sky and the gray and white hues of the buildings.
